title: Claude Code Agent Skill Frontmatter Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating the YAML frontmatter in SKILL.md files

name.description: Unique identifier for the skill using lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Maximum 64 characters.

description.description: Brief description of what this Skill does and when to use it (max 1024 characters). CRITICAL: Must include both WHAT the skill does AND WHEN Claude should use it. This is how Claude discovers your skill.
examples: Extract text and tables from PDF files, fill forms, merge documents. Use when working with PDF files or when the user mentions PDFs, forms, or document extraction.
Analyze Excel spreadsheets, create pivot tables, and generate charts. Use when working with Excel files, spreadsheets, or analyzing tabular data in .xlsx format.
Review code for best practices and potential issues. Use when reviewing code, checking PRs, or analyzing code quality.
Generates clear commit messages from git diffs. Use when writing commit messages or reviewing staged changes.

oneOf.description: List of specific tools Claude can use when this Skill is active without needing permission
Comma-separated list of tools (as used in actual SKILL.md files)

examples.name: pdf-processing
examples.description: Extract text, fill forms, merge PDFs. Use when working with PDF files, forms, or document extraction. Requires pypdf and pdfplumber packages.

examples.name: code-reviewer
examples.description: Review code for best practices and potential issues. Use when reviewing code, checking PRs, or analyzing code quality.

examples.name: safe-file-reader
examples.description: Read files without making changes. Use when you need read-only file access.

examples.name: generating-commit-messages
examples.description: Generates clear commit messages from git diffs. Use when writing commit messages or reviewing staged changes.

validationRules.description: Additional validation rules and best practices

format.const: lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

examples: Mention file types or contexts where applicable
Include both features AND use cases

purpose.const: Restrict tool access for security or scope control

behavior.const: When specified, Claude can use ONLY these tools without permission

examples: Read-only Skills that shouldn't modify files
Skills with limited scope (e.g., only data analysis)
